fab50ec2b21720ec27257eb71a03ced1 (07:22): I've burned a DVD image. The iso checks (SHA1SUM) matches the sum of the original SHA1SUM. The dvd itself matches the same checksum. (I used rawread from http://www.troubleshooters.com/linux/coasterless.htm) to get the checksum. They are identical. Yet the DVD fails mediacheck (even when I use the ide=nodma kernel option. http://forums.fedoraforum.org/archive/index.php/t-99750.html)
